description:
Access all the tools you need for data analysis with our comprehensive solution. Start shifting your focus from data to discovery and take advantage of NGS workflows, interpretation and visualization.


Bug fixes
- Fixed an issue causing labels for annotations on sequences displayed in "No wrap" mode to not be visible unless the start of the annotation was in view when using a HiDPI or other scaled monitor.
- CVEs fixed in this release include:
-  - CVE-2025-31257
  - CVE-2025-53066
  - CVE-2025-53057
  - CVE-2025-61748
Changes
The bundled Java version is Java 21.0.9, where we use the JRE from the Azul OpenJDK builds.
Advanced notice
The AGP export (legacy) tool will be retired in a future version of the software.
Please see the release notes for CLC Genomics Workbench 26.0, below, for a full list of changes since the last general release of this software.
